tool.name: ITS1 to ITSoneDB
tool.description: Map and parse metagenomic data to ITSoneDB
tool.command:
python $__tool_directory__/ITS1_mapper_and_parser.py
############################ ## Single file
#if $library.type == "single":
-s "$library.single_input"
############################ ## Paired file
#elif $library.type == "paired"
-p1 "$library.paired_1_input"
-p2 "$library.paired_2_input"
############################ ## Paired collection
#elif $library.type == "paired_collection":
-p1 #for $key in $library.paired_input.keys() $library.paired_input[$key]['forward'] #end for
-p2 #for $key in $library.paired_input.keys() $library.paired_input[$key]['reverse'] #end for
#end if
## fasta file -f "${fasta_file.fields.path}"
## bowtie2 execution ITSoneDB section -b "${bowtie2_indexes.fields.path}"
-i "$identity_percentage" -c "$coverage" -t "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}" -n "$match_number"

param.name: type
param.label: Single or Paired, file or collection

param.name: bowtie2_indexes
param.label: Bowtie 2 indexes
param.help: If your genome of interest is not listed, contact the Galaxy team

validator.message: No indexes are available for the selected input dataset

param.name: identity_percentage
param.label: Identity percentage threshold
param.help: A floating number from 0 to 1 (default is 0.97).

param.name: coverage
param.label: Coverage of the query sequence
param.help: A floating number from 0 to 1 (default is 0.7)
